safetyTips: There is no access to pub itself. Food orders are given a collection time that we ask people to adhere to. There is ample outside space to queue. Please do not use the seating area in front of the pub.
name: THE DOG HOUSE
address: The Dog House, Evegate, Station Road, Smeeth, Ashford, TN25 6SX
description: Open for Takeaway local ale and ciders all week.  Drink Collection Mon to Thur 5 to 7.  Drink and Food Fri and Sat 5-8 and Sun 12-3. Current full menu available for Takeaway (*see top of Facebook page and on our website). We will be offering localised delivery on Wed and Thur eve. All food and drink must be preordered, can be paid for on collection. Payment by card much preferred.
